name: Create ext ds for payroll result summary

content.query:
USE udacity
GO
-- Create master key
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'udacity_pw_001'

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL nyc_payroll
WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET = 'sp=racwdlme&st=2024-03-11T15:17:35Z&se=2024-03-11T23:17:35Z&sip=0.0.0.0&spr=https&sv=2022-11-02&sr=c&sig=E5vFXKHz1XZJeDwqsW3VS%2FWIE2%2FnyjscokL9crrifgg%3D'
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [NYC_Payroll_Summary] WITH
(
	LOCATION = 'https://udacitynycpayrollthomasm.blob.core.windows.net/udacity-nycpayroll-thomas-m',
	CREDENTIAL = nyc_payroll
)
https://udacitynycpayrollthomasm.blob.core.windows.net/udacity-nycpayroll-thomas-m
